tweets.text: @DrMariaNeira Please help us Dr Neira, MPs and @EnvAgencyMids minimising misery of a whole town

Unfortunately I don't think #WalleysQuarry will be shut down. I suspect pressure from central government is being applied to keep it open. That would explain why @EnvAgencyMids have completely abandoned their role as regulator and taken on the role of facilitator.

#StopTheStink

I'm SO SICK of the landfill gas from #WalleysQuarry filling my home all the damn time and having to report it in the early hours! Not reasonable to expect us to keep doing this ad infinitum in the hope something will change @EnvAgencyMids @NewsNBC @sinkstopthe #StopTheStink
@JuliaBradbury @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @guardian @Independent Reallly, thank you Julia. Your support means a lot. @StinkStopthe

tweets.text: What I got from today‚Äôs call with @ClareDinnisEA is the @@EnvAgencyMids and the @EnvAgency don‚Äôt know what they are doing; they can‚Äôt put a timescale on issues; they‚Äôre creating a longer term issue by not stopping waste going to Walley‚Äôs quarry and there are massive loop holes.

#BREAKING:

@thameswater fined ¬£4m after 79m litres of sewage sludge flooded a park and the #HogsmillRiver #chalkstream in south-west London. 

Photos show the sludge and debris carried along in the #pollution.

This is a breaking news story... More to come...
#NewMalden https://t.co/LKWTCcyC2K

tweets.text: @DrMariaNeira the community has been pointing to WHO safety data for some time now, but between the talk of various agencies, government departments & MPs, it is business as usual at the landfill site today, with new waste added every single day. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/v3rqrpW1Ik

tweets.text: Interestingly the @EnvAgency clearly &openly said that government funding had reduced their regulation.They‚Äôd gone from visiting landfill of this size at least once per week to checking their paperwork 6 times a year as this was all they were funded to do now #stopthestink

Prevention is better than cure! Stop using us for research & statistics! We have rights, Human Rights! I‚Äôm being gassed out now! @HumanRightsCtte @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @MindCharity @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe https://t.co/1a1qpVBp0I

@JuliaBradbury @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids negligence,no regulation,no root cause ,no leadership @JamesBevanEA  @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca just make it up as you go alongüò≥How can the site be allowed to accept waste with 10 permit breach since January? The health @PHE_uk concerns grow daily #stopthesstink

tweets.text: A few pictures of the Trash screen in the #Silkstream(25/05/2021)which show that if litter is not frequently removed, it just tips over the trash screen & the booms after heavy rainfall and ends up polluting the #WelshHarp #cleantheharp @EnvAgency https://t.co/ReCTf5FrTl

Did you know that we manage over 200km of underground, culverted rivers? End to end they would run from Birmingham to London. Keeping them flowing takes some serious expertise - so in today‚Äôs #50teams50days let me introduce those experts - going where we may not want too! https://t.co/iFCqitgP3m
@JuliaBradbury @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @MattHancock @guardian @Independent Surely someone somewhere can help us?!
